title: WTB: T206 Rube Marquard, Elmer Flick and Vic Willis
author: cp3fan

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Rube Marquard, Elmer Flick and Vic Willis
posts.post_content:
Hello All,
I;m currently looking to add Marquard, Elmer Flick and Vic Willis to my collection. I'm looking for any of these with common backs in PSA 3, 3.5 or 4 or SGC equivalent. PM me with pic and price if you have one available.
